page.title: 12LOCAL GHOSTS
page.content: THE GHOST OF{PATRICK'S FARM.}A MURDERER FLEEING FROM POLICE WAS HIDING IN PATRICK'S FARM'S LOFT.THE POLICE TRACKED HIM DOWN. PANICKING HE FLED BUT POLICE WERE SCOURING THE AREA, THERE WAS NO ESCAPE. HIS ONLY CHANCE WAS TO GO TO THE LOFT. A MAN WAS WAITING FOR HIM, ALAS THE MAN SHOT THE MURDERER. NOWADAYS EVERY{HALLOWEEN NIGHT YOU CAN HEAR THE MURDERER'S GHOST. {THE GREY LADY OF ASTLEY.}SHE WAS{ANNE, {2ND DAUGHTER OF THE RICH MORTS OF DAM {HOUSE.}SHE DIED AGED 18. ANNE FELL IN LOVE WITH{JAMES SPEAKMAN,}HER FATHER DISAPPROVED OF THIS MATCH. HE PAID THE SPEAKMANS TO LEAVE THE AREA. ANNE WENT ONE DAY TO FIND JAMES' COTTAGE EMPTY AND THEN FELL ILL. HER FATHER GOT JAMES BACK. THEY FOUND HER REMAINS AT {BEDFORD CHURCH.}PEOPLE SAY THEY SEE HER SEARCHING, SHE IS NOT AT REST.
